name: 祈風 Inorikaze - 數位版設定資料畫集 Digital Art Book
detailed_description:
This is the extra contents of Touhou doujin game "Inorikaze".
You will require to own the game before purchase and download this DLC.
You can access these contents from the main menu after installation.

■ Extra Downloadable Contents ■
．The special comic "The eye of truth."
．The collection of illustrations from promotion materials.
．Design of characters
．Illustrations of backgrounds, scenes, and line drafts.
．Design drafts.
．The interview with our staff.

short_description: This is the extra contents of Touhou doujin game "Inorikaze". The DLC includes special promotion comic, collections of illustration from promotion materials, character design data, the prototype of design documents, and interview to our staff.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: Pentium3 1.0GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/vista/8/10
  • Processor: Pentium3 1.0GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
